Description of incident: The Denver Police Dept.              reports that LimeWire's file-sharing program was exploited to access              personal and financial information from              approximately 75 different individual and business account names from              all over the country. The             information, which included tax records, bank account information,              online bill paying records and             other material, appears to have been stolen directly from computers              that were using LimeWire's filesharing             software program.
